title: Emerald Blossom Bangle - Vanki Design with Diamond Accents
materials: G-H Color). Features a fine Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional luster and durability.
features: This exquisitely crafted bangle features a traditional Vanki (cobra-head inspired) design, reimagined with a delicate floral motif. The centerpiece is a vibrant oval-cut emerald, surrounded by a halo of sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The openwork design showcases intricate filigree detailing, creating a light and airy feel. The bangle is hinged for easy wear and comfort. Traditional craftsmanship meets contemporary aesthetics in this timeless piece.
colors: with the striking contrast of the deep green emerald and the dazzling white diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and milestone birthdays. Its refined elegance also makes it a stunning accessory for formal events and contemporary celebrations.
description: This Emerald Blossom Bangle is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of the auspicious emerald and dazzling diamonds makes it a truly special piece. The Vanki design is steeped in South Indian tradition, symbolizing prosperity and protection. Crafted with high-quality materials and a durable Hyderabadi polish, this bangle is an investment piece that will be cherished for generations. It's a perfect blend of tradition and modernity, making it ideal for the discerning woman.
